title: iNai unakkillaiyE
sahitya:
iNai unakkillaiyE anuvAvi malai vElanE


anupallavi

  dinamum un tiruvaDi dhyAnikkum aDiyArai aNaittaruL kUrndu tuNai IndiDuvadil


caraNam    mEnmEl aDuttiDum innalait-taDuttiDa anbar unniDam aNugip-pan muraiyun
pon aDit-tuNai tanai perap-paNindadum annai pOl annArai anbuDan aNaivadil
